types.description: Persists the last input packet's data it receives in a given file, also repeating that packet on output port. Note that upon a new connection on the unique output port, if a previous stored packet is found, it will already be sent.
types.name: fs/persist-boolean

members.description: Path to file to persist a boolean packet in. The node won't create a new file, it must exist
members.name: path

in_ports.description: A boolean packet to persist (and repeat on output)
in_ports.name: IN

out_ports.description: A boolean packet with the persisted value of the node
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Persists the last input packet's data it receives in a given file system file, also repeating that packet on output port. Note that upon a new connection on the unique output port, if a previous stored packet is found, it will already be sent.
